mapper.insert: insert into t_dishtype (dish_Type_ID, dish_Type_Name, dish_Type_Desc, del_Flag, subBy) values (#{dishTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dishTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dishTypeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER})
